headline.main: Text of Landon's Speech Criticizing the President on Defense

lead_paragraph: KANSAS CITY, Kan., Oct. 17 -- Following is the text of an address made by Alfred M. Landon before the Second District Women's Republican Club here and broadcast over the Blue network of the National Broadcasting Company:
abstract: end of criticism of policy urged by Repr E E Cox, House
